EmailTemplate.name: 09-30-21 BNK SelfServe 24 Email 1.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: How is cash use changing?
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Payment trends are changing. Last year, we saw vast acceleration towards digital and a fall in overall cash use as lockdowns limited opportunity for cash spending. But are we ready for a cashless society? Definitely not. Cash use has rebounded and continues to be an important payment choice, particularly for low-income and unbanked parts of society. That’s why the European Central Bank has made supporting cash one of its strategic goals. Find out more in our latest blog. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
